      • daysBetween

        public static long daysBetween(Date fromDate,
                               Date toDate)
                        throws NullPointerException
        Calculates days between two dates.
        Parameters:
        fromDate - date that indicate beginning of period
        toDate - date that indicate end of period
        Returns:
        long difference between dates in days
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - exception thrown when one of the dates is empty

      • toDate

        public static Date toDate(long milliseconds)
        Convert milliseconds to date.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - date saved in milliseconds
        Returns:
        Date milliseconds converted to date

      • toFormattedString

        public static String toFormattedString(Date date)
                                throws NullPointerException
        Convert Date to String with usage of default ISO8601 formatting (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss).
        Parameters:
        date - date to convert and format
        Returns:
        String converted date and formatted to default ISO8601 format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - thrown when date not given

      • toFormattedString

        public static String toFormattedString(Date date,
                                       SimpleDateFormat format)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                       NullPointerException
        Convert Date to String with usage of given formatting pattern. If formatting pattern is not specified, default ISO8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss) will be used.
        Parameters:
        date - date to convert and format
        format - output formatting pattern
        Returns:
        String converted date with given formatting
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown when given formatting pattern is invalid
        NullPointerException - thrown when date not given

      • toMilliseconds

        public static long toMilliseconds(Date date)
                           throws NullPointerException
        Convert date to milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        date - date to convert
        Returns:
        long date representation as milliseconds
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - thrown when given date is empty

      • subtractDays

        public static Date subtractDays(Date date,
                                int days)
                         throws NullPointerException
        Subtract number of days from given date.
        Parameters:
        date - date from which days will be subtracted
        days - number of days to subtract
        Returns:
        Date date with subtracted days
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - thrown when given date is empty
